description:
FluentMigrator is a database migration framework for .NET written in C#. The basic idea is that you can create migrations which are simply classes that derive from the Migration base class and have a Migration attribute with a unique version number attached to them. Upon executing FluentMigrator, you tell it which version to migrate to and it will run all necessary migrations in order to bring your database up to that version.
  In addition to forward migration support, FluentMigrator also supports different ways to execute the migrations along with selective migrations called profiles and executing arbitrary SQL.
releaseNotes:
Improvements & Features:

* Added description support for tables and columns on MS Sql Server and Oracle [@stefan-ojog](https://github.com/stefan-ojog)
* Added description support for migrations [@drucik86](https://github.com/drucik86)
* It is now possible to stop fluentmigrator from deleting the version schema [@tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien)

Bug fixes:

* SqlServer: SqlServer2000Processor sql template error [@starpeng](https://github.com/starpeng)
* VersionLoader should read version column by name so it does not matter in which order the columns are in the table [@masongup](https://github.com/masongup)

Various:
* FluentMigrator is now attributed with CLSCompliant [@lahma](https://github.com/lahma)
title: Fluent Migrator
